awards.name: Dynamic Women Entrepreneurs | Real Estate 2024-25
awards.description: Humbled to receive the Dynamic Women Entrepreneurs - Real Estate 2024-25 award at The Times of India event, held at Hyatt Regency Ahmedabad. This recognition belongs to the entire SmartHomes Infrastructure team, where we foster inclusivity, innovation, and impactful leadership. Here's to many more milestones together!

awards.page_title: Smart Homes' Success Story in Dholera Smart City
awards.bannerTitle: Smart Homes' Success Story in Dholera Smart City
awards.name: Smart Homes' Success Story in Dholera Smart City | ET Industry Leaders 2024
awards.description: We are thrilled and honoured to receive the "Excellence in Real Estate Development in Dholera Smart City" award at the ET Industry Leaders 2024. This prestigious recognition from The Times Group is a testament to our dedication and hard work in transforming Dholera into a futuristic smart city. Thank you to our team and supporters for making this achievement possible.

awards.name: Visionaries of the year | Times Reality & Retail Icons - 2021
awards.description: SmartHomes Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd. is honoured to receive the "Visionaries of the Year" award at the Times Realty & Retail Icons 2021 in Ahmedabad. This accolade celebrates our dedication to innovation and excellence in real estate.

awards.name: Celebrating a Remarkable Achievement| 2017
awards.description: We are honoured to receive this token of appreciation from the Dholera SIR Developers Association (DSDA) for our generous sponsorship contribution to the Dholera Developers & Investors Summit held on December 26, 2017, in Ahmedabad. This recognition highlights our commitment to supporting and fostering growth in the Dholera Smart City initiative.

awards.bannerTitle: Woman of the Year in Real Estate Industry
awards.page_title: Woman of the Year in Real Estate Industry
awards.name: Woman of the Year in Real Estate Industry| Times Power Women 2023
awards.description: Meenakshi Khurana, Director of Smart Homes Infrastructure Dholera, receives "Woman of the Year in Real Estate Industry" at the Times Power Women 2023 awards. This honor, presented by The Times Group, P. Ramesh, and MagSon, recognizes her exceptional contributions and leadership in real estate. Her visionary approach and dedication have set new industry benchmarks.

awards.bannerTitle: Celebrating Excellence in Real Estate Development
awards.page_title: Celebrating Excellence in Real Estate Development
awards.name: Celebrating Excellence in Real Estate Development | Times Gujarat Icons 2022
awards.description:
SmartHomesDholera, the leading real estate developer in Dholera SIR wins the “Times Gujarat Icons 2022 Award” in the Real Estate Development Segment for promoting the “Multi-Trillion Dollar City - Dholera Greenfield Smart City”, the dream project of our Honourable PM Shri Narendra Modi, as the Rising Star, the Pride of Gujarat and Second Biggest Greenfield Smart City Globally.

Truly honoured and Privileged to get acknowledgement from Madam Dr Nimaben Acharya, Speaker of Gujarat Assembly, Shri Sanjeev Ambrish Mehta Sr. BJP Leader & Ms. Amyra Dastur, Bollywood Star.
